Command: scipionwrite

Usage:
scipion

The scipion command list all the plugins developed by scipion for chimera.

  • scipioncombine: combines two models.
  • scipionrs: restores chimera session.
  • scipionshell: shows the density of a 3D Map on a spherical shell of the map at a given radius.
  • scipionshellcrown: cuts a shell from a 3D map at a given radius.
  • scipionss: saves chimera session.
  • scipionwrite: writes model to disk.

scipion@cnb.csic.es
